content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```
using Markdown

function extract_julia_code(md::Markdown.MD)
    # Extract all the code blocks from the markdown document
    code_blocks = Markdown.CodeBlock[]
    for element in md.content
        if isa(element, Markdown.CodeBlock)
            push!(code_blocks, element)
        end
    end

    # Remove code fences from each code block
    for i in 1:length(code_blocks)
        code_blocks[i].fence = ""
    end

    # Join the code blocks together with a newline
    joined_code = join([code.text for code in code_blocks], '\n')

    return joined_code
end
```
